column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I've had pizza in Brooklyn and I've had pizza in Italy.  Lou Malnati's was my first foray into Chicago deep dish pizza
column3: I'm impressed.  If you are a fan of New York style pizza and you are expecting something similar
column4: stay away.  This is a completely different experience
column6: it does take 35-40 minutes to cook even a 9 inch pie
column7: but if you have the time to wait
column8: it's worth the trip.  The appetizers were very generous
column9: and the pizza itself was fantastic.  The service was also very attentive.  Now I have to find a place that does a good deep dish in Washington...
